points.title: Resources
points.content: And it receives two arguments, first Vuex context and second Nuxt context.
There are three types of route middleware in Nuxt.
Global Middleware. Global Middleware are registered in Nuxt config.
Intercept incoming request and conditionally modify business logic before serving the page on client-side.
Validate hook validates the parameter defined in dynamic routes.
Use this hook to verify the existence or integrity of the dynamic paramater.
If validation fails, it automagically redirects to the error page.
Asyncdata methods is used to pull data and set it locally
